speaker.name: Yan Orestes
speaker.biography: Yan is a Brazilian Python developer, speaker, privacy freak and security enthusiast. He's worked as a teacher and takes education as a true passion in his life. Whenever he finds time, Yan ends up writing blog posts and essays and talking in conferences everywhere, following what he believes is most important in the world - sharing knowledge.
